name: Sweet Escape VR
description: Climb and race against your friends up and down candy landscapes in this wild Virtual Reality experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Yes!
